content:
vk4jkl said
Since installing the latest update today, I have completely lost the opportunity to GET mail for individual emails. What/where have you done with that action!! We have installed ver 115.3.1, and am totally racked off.

Try right clicking the icon.
creator: MattAuSupport

content:
All Mail is really a furphy as far as being an imap folder. It is literally what it says on the label "all your mail in that account" The best advice I can give you for it is to unsubscribe from it. Right click the folder and unsubscribe you will not longer see it so not be bothered by the fact you can't move around mail from the folder that must contain everything.

You might want to read about some of the particularities of gmail in the support documents instead of assuming here https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/thunderbird-and-gmail
creator: MattAuSupport

content: If you got as far as the troubleshooting mode you will have seen the disable all addons and restart option. I suggest you try that one. If that does not do it. Look to any antivirus program you may have, they often inject incompatible addons into the running process and mess up new versions of Thunderbird.
creator: MattAuSupport
